title: Chicken and pumpkin risotto
ingredients: ['50g butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 chicken breasts, cubed', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 litre chicken stock', '1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '280g arborio or risotto rice', '1/2 glass white wine', '180g pumpkin puree or stewed pumpkin', '30g Parmesan cheese, grated']
